queries.query: WITH DB_CPU_Stats AS (SELECT DatabaseID, DB_Name(DatabaseID) AS [Database Name], SUM(total_worker_time) AS [CPU_Time_Ms] FROM sys.dm_exec_query_stats AS qs CROSS APPLY (SELECT CONVERT(int, value) AS [DatabaseID] FROM sys.dm_exec_plan_attributes(qs.plan_handle) WHERE attribute = N'dbid') AS F_DB GROUP BY DatabaseID) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [CPU_Time_Ms] DESC) AS [CPU_Rank], [Database Name], [CPU_Time_Ms] AS [CPU_Time_(ms)], CAST([CPU_Time_Ms] * 1.0 / SUM([CPU_Time_Ms]) OVER() * 100.0 AS DECIMAL(5, 2)) AS [CPU_Percent] FROM DB_CPU_Stats WHERE DatabaseID <> 32767 -- ResourceDB ORDER BY [CPU_Rank] OPTION (RECOMPILE)
